item.title: Use case template
item.description: tags Computer Science Programming Methodologies Software Engineering The following is a requirements template developed by Alistair Cockburn. This template may or may not have all or more fields related to the requirements itself. Recommended reading: Basic Use Case Template USE CASE #N Goal in context Scope Level <one of: Summary, Primary task, Subfunction> Preconditions Success end condition Failed end condition Primary actor <a role name for the primary actor, or description> Trigger <the action upon the system that starts the use case, may be time event> Priority <how critical to your system/organization> Frequency Usage example:
